https://ruddra.com/tags/covid-19/Recent content in COVID-19 on RuddraHugo -- gohugo.ioMon, 30 Mar 2020 00:00:02 +0600
Find Best Neighborhood to Fight Pandemic in NYC - Visualization and Resulthttps://ruddra.com/posts/project-battle-of-capstones-visualization-results/Mon, 30 Mar 2020 00:00:02 +0600https://ruddra.com/posts/project-battle-of-capstones-visualization-results/Disclaimer: this article has been generated as part of IBM Data Science Professional Certificate course’s final submission. This report consists of three parts: business problem and data preparation, methodology, visualization and results. In this part, we are going visualize the data, discuss about the results and draw a conclusion.
Find Best Neighborhood to Fight Pandemic in NYC - Methodologyhttps://ruddra.com/posts/project-battle-of-capstones-methodology/Mon, 30 Mar 2020 00:00:01 +0600https://ruddra.com/posts/project-battle-of-capstones-methodology/Disclaimer: this article has been generated as part of IBM Data Science Professional Certificate course’s final submission. This report consists of three parts: business problem and data preparation, methodology, visualization and results. In this article we are going to describe the methodology we used in step by step: Table of contents  Step one: New York city data with latitude and longitude Step two: New York city data with population Step three: combine step one and step two Step four: collect hospital data from Foursquare Step five: collect hospital bed data from NYS Health Profile Step six: combine step four and step five Step seven: combine data from step three and step six Step eight: add bed and icu per hundred people to data frame Step nine: K-means clustering Step ten: merge cluster labels with dataset Step eleven: see which borough goes to which cluster Step twelve: neighborhoods without hospital Conclusion
Find Best Neighborhood to Fight Pandemic in NYC - Data Preparationhttps://ruddra.com/posts/project-battle-of-capstones/Mon, 30 Mar 2020 00:00:00 +0600https://ruddra.com/posts/project-battle-of-capstones/Disclaimer: this report has been generated as part of IBM Data Science Professional Certificate course’s final submission. This report consists of three parts: business problem and data preparation, methodology, visualization and results. In this part, we will discuss about business problem and data preparation steps. Table of contents  Business problem Data Approach Data preparation Source code Conclusion
